name: Species Unite
description:
Species Unite

You see the world is about to come to an end due to an alien attack. The world is surrounded and there are only 4 species remaining to defend it. Each have unique capabilities that are: Speed, Agility, Strength and Weapon expertise. But they are about to fall on their own. You would like to help these 4 species. You have a unique technology that allows you to combine the capabilities of the species to get stronger together by forming fused species. If they do not unite they will perish.  However, the enemy learned about this and seeing the prospect of this technology captured some fused species. The enemy boss has created levels of dungeons filled with enemy species and hid the captured fused species in cages. You can free them as you go through the levels. You can save the world when you beat the enemy boss.
